statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -4 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 16 \\ -8 \\ 12 \\ 8 \\ -24 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -52 \\ 36 \\ -34 \\ -32 \\ 68 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
